 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָבַץ‎</span><sub>127</sub> **verb** ==gather, collect== (synonym <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span>) (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***grasp, seize***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קבץֿ‎</span> ***harvest***, in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֿק‎</span>, attribute of 'Attar, according to Fell<sup>ZMG liv (1900), 237 f.</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***fail, despair***; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבָּץ‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.1|1Kgs 20:1]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְבָּץֿ‎</span> [[Ps.41.7|Ps 41:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקְכֹּץ‎</span> [[Gen.41.48|Gen 41:48]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְבֹץ‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.19|1Kgs 18:19]], masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבְצוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.7.5|1Sam 7:5]] +; ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְקָבְצִי‎</span> [[Zeph.3.8|Zeph 3:8]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹבֵץ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.19|Ezek 22:19]]; [[Prov.13.11|Prov 13:11]] ***passive*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְכוּצִים‎</span> [[Neh.5.16|Neh 5:16]] — ***gather, collect:*** 

**1.** with accusative of thing, grain [[Gen.41.35|Gen 41:35]]; [[Gen.41.48|Gen 41:48]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), booty [[Deut.13.17|Deut 13:17]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location), money [[2Chr.24.5|2Chr 24:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person), so [[Ezek.16.31|Ezek 16:31]] ([[BDB#Gr|Gr]] Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]], reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְבֹּץ‎</span> from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְקַלֵּס‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]]. [[BDB#Symm|Symm]]); accusative omitted <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹבֵץ‎</span> [[Prov.13.11|Prov 13:11]] ***one gathering*** by degrees; figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָֿוֶן לוֺ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבּוֺ יִק‎</span> [[Ps.41.7|Ps 41:7]] ***his heart gathereth wickedness to itself.*** 

**2.** usually with accusative of person ***gather, assemble***, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative [[1Sam.7.5|1Sam 7:5]]; [[1Sam.29.1|1Sam 29:1]] (for battle); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location [[1Kgs.18.20|1Kgs 18:20]]; [[Ezra.8.15|Ezra 8:15]]; [[Esth.2.3|Esth 2:3]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person [[2Sam.3.21|2Sam 3:21]]; [[Hab.2.5|Hab 2:5]] (in figurative; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span>); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) person [[1Kgs.11.24|1Kgs 11:24]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person and location [[1Kgs.18.19|1Kgs 18:19]]; [[2Chr.32.6|2Chr 32:6]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[2Chr.23.2|2Chr 23:2]], compare [[Ezra.7.28|Ezra 7:28]] accusative of person alone [[1Kgs.22.6|1Kgs 22:6]] = [[2Chr.18.5|2Chr 18:5]]; [[2Kgs.10.18|2Kgs 10:18]]; [[Neh.7.5|Neh 7:5]] (+ infinitive purpose), [[Joel.2.16|Joel 2:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span>), [[2Chr.15.9|2Chr 15:9]]; [[2Chr.24.5|2Chr 24:5]]; [[2Chr.25.5|2Chr 25:5]] passive with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of work [[Neh.5.16|Neh 5:16]] for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgement [[Zeph.3.3|Zeph 3:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span>), [[Ezek.22.20|Ezek 22:20]] compare v[[Ezek.22.19|Ezek 22:19]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלאתּוֺךְ‎</span>; figurative of metals into furnace); specifically for war, battle, [[Judg.12.4|Judg 12:4]]; [[1Sam.28.1|1Sam 28:1]]; [[2Sam.2.30|2Sam 2:30]]; [[1Kgs.20.1|1Kgs 20:1]]; [[2Kgs.6.24|2Kgs 6:24]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַצָּבָא‎</span> [[1Sam.28.1|1Sam 28:1]] ([[1Sam.29.1|1Sam 29:1]] see above). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְבְּצוּ‎</span> [[Josh.10.6|Josh 10:6]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקָּבֵץ‎</span> [[Ezek.29.5|Ezek 29:5]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקָּֽבְצוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.7.6|1Sam 7:6]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקָּֽבְצוּ‎</span> [[Gen.49.2|Gen 49:2]] +; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקָּבֵץ‎</span> [[Ezra.10.7|Ezra 10:7]] +; ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְבָּצִים‎</span> [[Jer.40.15|Jer 40:15]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְבָּצָיו‎</span> [[Isa.56.8|Isa 56:8]] — 

**1.** intransitive ***assemble, gather*** [[1Sam.25.1|1Sam 25:1]]; [[Gen.49.2|Gen 49:2]]; [[Isa.45.20|Isa 45:20]]; [[Isa.48.14|Isa 48:14]]; [[Isa.49.18|Isa 49:18]]; [[Isa.60.4|Isa 60:4]]; [[Joel.4.11|Joel 4:11]]; [[2Chr.20.4|2Chr 20:4]] (+ infinitive purpose) [[2Chr.32.4|2Chr 32:4]] for war [[1Sam.28.4|1Sam 28:4]]; [[Josh.10.6|Josh 10:6]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> ***against***); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative [[1Sam.7.6|1Sam 7:6]], accusative of location [[Ezra.10.7|Ezra 10:7]]; [[Ezra.10.9|Ezra 10:9]]; [[2Chr.15.10|2Chr 15:10]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person ***unto*** [[Jer.40.15|Jer 40:15]]; [[1Chr.13.2|1Chr 13:2]]; [[Ezra.10.1|Ezra 10:1]]; [[Neh.4.14|Neh 4:14]], compare [[2Chr.13.7|2Chr 13:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative [[1Chr.11.1|1Chr 11:1]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְדָּו‎</span> [[Hos.2.2|Hos 2:2]]; [[Isa.43.9|Isa 43:9]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span>), [[Ps.102.23|Ps 102:23]] of birds and beasts [[Isa.34.15|Isa 34:15]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span>), [[Ezek.39.17|Ezek 39:17]]. 

**2.** passive ***be gathered*** [[Isa.60.7|Isa 60:7]] (of flocks, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person), [[Esth.2.8|Esth 2:8]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location), v[[Esth.2.19|Esth 2:19]] participle with suffix person [[Isa.56.8|Isa 56:8]]; [[Ezek.29.5|Ezek 29:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אסף‎</span>) read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקָּבֵר‎</span> [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] (not [[BDB#Sm|Sm]]) [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]. **Pi\`el**<sub>51</sub> Perfect 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְקִכֶּצְךָ‎</span> [[Deut.30.3|Deut 30:3]] consecutive, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבְּצָם‎</span> [[Mic.4.12|Mic 4:12]]; [[Ps.107.3|Ps 107:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִכְּצָן‎</span> [[Isa.34.16|Isa 34:16]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבָּ֑צָה‎</span> [[Isa.1.7|Isa 1:7]], etc.; Imperfect <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְקַבֵּץ‎</span> [[Isa.11.12|Isa 11:12]]; [[Isa.40.11|Isa 40:11]], etc.; Imperative, masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַכְּצֵנוּ‎</span> [[1Chr.16.35|1Chr 16:35]]; [[Ps.106.47|Ps 106:47]] Infinitive absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַכֵּץ‎</span> [[Mic.2.12|Mic 2:12]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַכֵּץ‎</span> [[Isa.66.13|Isa 66:13]] etc.; Participle<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקַכֵּץ‎</span> [[Nah.3.18|Nah 3:18]] +, etc.; — ***gather together:*** 

**1.** usually of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> gathering his dispersed people (accusative), sometimes under figure of flock: [[Mic.2.12|Mic 2:12]] + infinitive absolute (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span>), [[Mic.4.6|Mic 4:6]]; [[Zeph.3.19|Zeph 3:19]]; [[Zeph.3.20|Zeph 3:20]]; [[Jer.31.10|Jer 31:10]]; [[Zech.10.8|Zech 10:8]]; [[Isa.54.7|Isa 54:7]]; [[Isa.56.8|Isa 56:8]]a, compare also [[Isa.40.11|Isa 40:11]] with accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[Deut.30.3|Deut 30:3]]; [[Deut.30.4|Deut 30:4]]; [[Jer.23.5|Jer 23:5]]; [[Jer.29.14|Jer 29:14]]; [[Jer.31.8|Jer 31:8]]; [[Jer.32.37|Jer 32:37]]; [[Ezek.11.17|Ezek 11:17]] + 6 t. Ezekiel + [[Ezek.37.21|Ezek 37:21]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסָּבִיב‎</span>), [[Isa.11.12|Isa 11:12]]; [[Isa.43.5|Isa 43:5]]; [[Zech.10.10|Zech 10:10]]; [[Neh.1.9|Neh 1:9]] Psalm + [[Neh.106.4|Neh 106:4]], compare \|\| [[1Chr.16.35|1Chr 16:35]]; [[Ps.107.3|Ps 107:3]] accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Isa.56.8|Isa 56:8]]b (compare **Niph\`al** ***Participle***); = (***gather*** and) restrain [[Hos.8.10|Hos 8:10]] (with accusative alone); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***gathering*** dispersed Egyptians, accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[Ezek.29.13|Ezek 29:13]] ***gathering*** the nations (accusative) for judgment [[Mic.4.12|Mic 4:12]]; [[Isa.66.18|Isa 66:18]]; [[Joel.4.2|Joel 4:2]] ***gathering*** lovers of Jerusalem (under figure of harlot) [[Ezek.16.37|Ezek 16:37]] (twice in verse) (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסָּבִיב‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person ***against***); ***gathering*** beasts into Edom [[Isa.34.16|Isa 34:16]]. 

**2.** men subject: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִצְרַיִם תְּקַבְּצֵם מֹף תְּקַבְּרֵם‎</span> [[Hos.9.6|Hos 9:6]] (compare [[Ezek.29.5|Ezek 29:5]] **Niph\`al**, above), [[Neh.13.11|Neh 13:11]] with accusative of thing [[Mic.1.7|Mic 1:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>), [[Isa.22.9|Isa 22:9]]; [[Isa.62.9|Isa 62:9]]; [[Prov.28.8|Prov 28:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵין מְקַבֵּץ‎</span> ***none that gathereth*** [[Isa.13.14|Isa 13:14]] (accusative omitted), [[Nah.3.18|Nah 3:18]] (***id.***), [[Jer.49.5|Jer 49:5]] (followed by<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַֹנּדֵד‎</span>, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> **3** near the end). 

**3.** perhaps (***gather*** and so) ***take away*** (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָסַף‎</span> **4**), [[Nah.2.11|Nah 2:11]]; [[Joel.2.6|Joel 2:6]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּארוּר‎</span>. **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקֻבֶּצֶת‎</span> [[Ezek.38.8|Ezek 38:8]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) of land (for people) of Israel **Hithpa\`el** ***gather together*** (intransitive), ***be gathered together.*** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְקַבְּצוּ‎</span> [[Judg.9.47|Judg 9:47]]; [[1Sam.7.7|1Sam 7:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְקַבְּצוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.8.2|1Sam 8:2]]; [[1Sam.22.2|1Sam 22:2]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְק‎</span> [[Isa.44.11|Isa 44:11]] for battle, war, ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַתְקַבְּצוּ‎</span> [[Jer.49.14|Jer 49:14]] ***Imperfect*** also [[Josh.9|Josh 9]]: (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִחְדָּו‎</span>, + infinitive purpose), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי‎</span> person [[2Sam.2.25|2Sam 2:25]].
